languages.text: {n}{petname} остается холодным и невозмутимым, словно вы погладили не кибербестию, а цельный кусок пластали. Лишь легкое подергивание хвоста подсказывает, что ваша ласка принята и оценена по достоинству.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} остается холодным и невозмутимым, словно вы погладили не кибербестию, а цельный кусок пластали. Лишь легкое подергивание купированного хвоста подсказывает, что ваша ласка принята и оценена по достоинству.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} остается холодным и невозмутимым, словно вы погладили не кибербестию, а цельный кусок пластали. Лишь легкое подергивание хвоста подсказывает, что ваша ласка принята и оценена по достоинству.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you had touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

{n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}は冷たく無表情に佇んでおり、まるで無機物に触れているかのようだった。わずかに揺れたサイバーマスチフの尻尾だけが、あなたの愛情に気付き、喜んでいる印だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は冷たく無表情に佇んでおり、まるで無機物に触れているかのようだった。わずかに揺れたサイバーマスチフの尻尾だけが、あなたの愛情に気付き、喜んでいる印だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} bleibt kalt und ungerührt, als hättest du ein unbelebtes Stück Metall berührt. Nur ein leichtes Wedeln des Schwanzes zeigt, dass der Cyber-Mastiff deine Zuneigung wahrgenommen hat und sie gutheißt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} bleibt kalt und ungerührt, als hättest du ein unbelebtes Stück Metall berührt. Nur ein leichtes Wedeln des Schwanzes zeigt, dass der Cyber-Mastiff deine Zuneigung wahrgenommen hat und sie gutheißt.

languages.text: {n}{petname} permanece frío e impasible, como si hubieras tocado una losa de metal inerte. Solo el ligero movimiento de la cola del cibermastín indica que tu afecto ha sido reconocido y agradecido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} permanece frío e impasible, como si hubieras tocado una losa de metal inerte. Solo el ligero movimiento de la cola del cibermastín indica que tu afecto ha sido reconocido y agradecido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}对你的爱抚无动于衷，仿佛你触碰的是没有生命的塑钢板一样。不过，它的尾巴微微抽动了一下。你意识到，它感觉到了你对它的喜爱，也很喜欢你这么做。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}对你的爱抚无动于衷，仿佛你触碰的是没有生命的塑钢板一样。不过，它的尾巴微微抽动了一下。你意识到，它感觉到了你对它的喜爱，也很喜欢你这么做。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}, sanki cansız bir metal tabakaya dokunmuşsun gibi soğuk ve ifadesiz bir şekilde duruyor. Göstermiş olduğunun sevginin takdir edildiğini gösteren tek ibare, siber mastifin kuyruğundaki hafif kıpırdanma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}, sanki cansız bir metal tabakaya dokunmuşsun gibi soğuk ve ifadesiz bir şekilde durur. Göstermiş olduğunun sevginin takdir edildiğini gösteren tek ibare, siber mastifin kuyruğundaki hafif kıpırdanmadır.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} reste aussi froid et impassible qu'une plaque de métal inanimée. Seul le léger frémissement de la queue du cyber-mastiff témoigne que votre affection a été perçue et appréciée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} remains cold and impassive as if you touched an inanimate slab of metal. Only the slight twitch of the cyber-mastiff's tail indicates that your affection has been acknowledged and appreciated.{/n}
